job_details.Functieomschrijving:
As an AI/ML Full Stack Engineer, at AND Digital you'll act as a hands on, Engineer working across a Club's portfolio of clients, onsite and in multi-skilled agile delivery teams. As a result, you will need to be able to:
     * Work with junior developers in the field of AI and ML engineering on your team through technical issues.
     * Guide and support the improvement of data skills for the junior developers in your team.
     * Work closely with clients to help implement, review or remediate their machine learning strategies.

   To do that, it's essential you bring the following:
   *
     * Experience with AI/ML toolkits and libraries. Particularly; PyTorch, Transformers, Gradio, Jupyter Notebook, NumPy, Pandas, Matplotlib, Scikit-Learn.
     * Understanding of MLOps best practices.
     * Understanding of the mathematical foundations of ML algorithms.
     * Experience in building and maintaining RESTFul ML model APIs
job_details.full_text:
AI/ML Senior Full-Stack Engineer

As an AI/ML Full Stack Engineer, at AND Digital you'll act as a hands on, Engineer working across a Club's portfolio of clients, onsite and in multi-skilled agile delivery teams. As a result, you will need to be able to:
     * Work with junior developers in the field of AI and ML engineering on your team through technical issues.
     * Guide and support the improvement of data skills for the junior developers in your team.
     * Work closely with clients to help implement, review or remediate their machine learning strategies.

   To do that, it's essential you bring the following:
   *
     * Experience with AI/ML toolkits and libraries. Particularly; PyTorch, Transformers, Gradio, Jupyter Notebook, NumPy, Pandas, Matplotlib, Scikit-Learn.
     * Understanding of MLOps best practices.
     * Understanding of the mathematical foundations of ML algorithms.
     * Experience in building and maintaining RESTFul ML model APIs

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes core ML engineering tasks such as working with AI/ML toolkits, understanding mathematical foundations of ML algorithms, and building/maintaining RESTful ML model APIs. While it mentions working with junior developers and client interaction, the primary focus remains on the technical implementation and operationalization of ML models.

phrases.phrase: Work closely with clients to help implement, review or remediate their machine learning strategies.
phrases.justification: This phrase indicates interaction with clients to understand their needs and align ML strategies, which falls under understanding the business context and translating it into technical requirements.

phrases.phrase: Understanding of the mathematical foundations of ML algorithms.
phrases.justification: This directly relates to the core process of creating and understanding machine learning models.

phrases.phrase: Experience with AI/ML toolkits and libraries. Particularly; PyTorch, Transformers, Gradio, Jupyter Notebook, NumPy, Pandas, Matplotlib, Scikit-Learn.
phrases.justification: These are tools and libraries used for building, training, and evaluating machine learning models.

phrases.phrase: Experience in building and maintaining RESTFul ML model APIs
phrases.justification: This involves developing software components (APIs) to serve ML models, which is a key aspect of software development in an ML context.
This explicitly mentions MLOps, which is the domain of building and managing ML systems in production.

skills: Work with junior developers in the field of AI and ML engineering on your team through technical issues.
Guide and support the improvement of data skills for the junior developers in your team.
Work closely with clients to help implement, review or remediate their machine learning strategies.
act as a hands on, Engineer working across a Club's portfolio of clients, onsite and in multi-skilled agile delivery teams.
Guide and support the improvement of data skills for the junior developers in your team.
